detectors.description:

detectors.description: blistContract.payAllWorkers() (../../../BlockChain/Hackathon/contracts/blistContract.sol#47-68) has external calls inside a loop: address(workerAddress_scope_1).transfer(amount) (../../../BlockChain/Hackathon/contracts/blistContract.sol#65)

detectors.description:
blistContract.registerExit() (../../../BlockChain/Hackathon/contracts/blistContract.sol#34-45) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(entryExit.exitTime == 0,Already exited) (../../../BlockChain/Hackathon/contracts/blistContract.sol#37)
	- exitTime - entryExit.entryTime >= 28800 (../../../BlockChain/Hackathon/contracts/blistContract.sol#42)
detectors.markdown:
[blistContract.registerExit()](../../../BlockChain/Hackathon/contracts/blistContract.sol#L34-L45) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- [require(bool,string)(entryExit.exitTime == 0,Already exited)](../../../BlockChain/Hackathon/contracts/blistContract.sol#L37)
	- [exitTime - entryExit.entryTime >= 28800](../../../BlockChain/Hackathon/contracts/blistContract.sol#L42)

detectors.description:
